biotools.summary: Management and analysis of exome sequencing data. Provides a user friendly data acquisition module to facilitate comprehensive and intuitive data handling. Provides also direct access to the analysis pipeline SIMPLEX, which can be configured to run locally, on a cluster, or in the cloud.

bioschemas.name: SeqBench
